text: 4:17 Jenesis 17:5; Aisaia 48:13; 1 Korin 1:28; Efesus 2:1; 2:5; 1 Pita 2:10Kamaghɨn amizɨ Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ nɨ damightɨ nɨ kantrin avɨribar afeziamɨn otogham.” Akar dɨkɨrɨzir kam, God uabɨ a gamizɨ an an damazimɨn gavgafi. Godɨn kamra, Abraham nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an iti. Egha Godɨn kamra, a gumazamizir ovengezibagh amima me ua dɨkafi, egha a pura mɨgeima bizir faragha itir puvatɨziba, da otifi.4:17 Grighɨn akam, vezɨn kam deragha bigha mɨkemezir puvatɨ. Marazi nɨghnɨgha ghaze, vezɨn kam kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Abraham, Godɨn damazimɨn en ovavir afeziam.”
